findings.message: Summary overstates enforcement scope: it says local tests are eliminated 'via agent-mediated paths,' but the same paragraph (and Goals at line 41) acknowledges direct local commands such as `pnpm test:affected` are policy-only and not technically blocked. This creates a scope contradiction in correctness language.

gate_result: credible â€” score 4.5 >= 4.0 threshold; no Critical findings; Round 3 not required per iteration rules
